title: When you get used to it, you might like it
text:
Comparing to a lot of other similar messengers it is way superior:

- works way better with bad internet service
- has a lot of features that can cover various use cases: groups, teams, 1-1 chats, storage for photos, news, etc

The bad things are:

- you can quickly find a lot if small bugs, like custom photos for your contacts turn out blur. Sharing to group with topics does not respect which topic you select and goes to general. Weird UI effects, when sometimes hard to get to exit some view without actually performing an action. 
- some things are not intuitive, so you really have to read their announcements about new features to figure out how they work. 
- update messages on app store just show the same for patch releases. 
- no watch application

I am a paid user. Anyway, love it, just because it is way better than others, but could be better.

title: Current version has issue with gifs on iPad Pro
text:
Gifs can cause the iPad to crash. Begins with stuttering performance and dropping animation frames. Regardless of whether you‚Äôre using the magic keyboard or touch, it‚Äôll eventually become unresponsive to the point where your iPad is frozen and you have to force-reboot it. If you do manage to get out of the app the issues persist until you remove the app from your recents list. Really hoping this can be addressed soon. Telegram is my go-to for messaging and this is simply debilitating at this point.

Update: still has significant performance issues and will randomly cause the iPad to restart. Really hoping these problems can be addressed.

title: Problem since I changed my phone !
text: Telegram is definitely one the best messengers and I‚Äôve been using it for like 6 or 7 years and never had any problems with it UNTIL now ! Previously I was using it on my iPhone SE and it was cool but recently I changed my Phone and now using it on my Iphone X and facing some issues . I can‚Äôt edit and delete messages for others like I could . I can only delete the messages for myself and I others would still see the them . And also the ‚Äúedit‚Äù option would always come handy but I can‚Äôt find it anymore .

title: Images and videos not loading
text:
I use Telegram on an iPhone 14, iPhone 7 plus, and on my computer browser. In the past few days, I have issues with photos and videos not downloading on either of my Telegrams. I have no connectivity issues, and I tried both wifi and data on my iPhones. It makes the use of app very uncomfortable. 

Another issue is that once opening the app on iPhone after a few hours and selecting a channel to read its unread messages, upon opening the first chat/channel/group, it skips all the way to the end of unread messages and I have to scroll back up to read them until getting to ‚ÄúUnread messages‚Äù. This is weird.

title: Best messenger app out there.
text:
Hands down, the best app for messaging conversations that I‚Äôve used. It has all the best features of every other messenger app out there, with the addition of many of their own great features, but with the exception of not having ‚Äúreactions‚Äù, like we‚Äôve seen in some messengers in recent years.

The biggest pros to Telegram is the ability to send large files as well as files of virtually any kind. On top of that, they offer message editing, deleting, scheduled messages, text formatting, hashtags, and more.

Get it while you still can.

title: Bug fix,PLEASE!
text: So basically,I‚Äôve been using Telegram for like,2 months now? And i‚Äôve had a few problems. One,I‚Äôm in a group,and they post videos often. I open one of the videos,and it works. For a few seconds,and then starts glitching terribly with pink all over the screen. If pink isn‚Äôt there,then it‚Äôs just horrible glitching. Second,when I tried to open another video,the video played for a few seconds,and then started at the beginning again. Just replaying. And lastly,in short,I cant play any videos anymore telegram. Please fix this.

title: From a 4 to a would be zero but I can‚Äôt put a zero
text:

I used it for about 6-8 months now. That is until I found myself trying to find social group networks in my area and when I tried to report a group I had ‚Äúwandered‚Äù because the group title was misleading and noticed and tried to report it for the content‚Ä¶ I was banned for what following the guidelines they have to be a snitch !?!?

title: Latest update broke my most used feature
text:
Opening a link to image in a local preview within the client has been a standard feature since telegram‚Äôs initial release.
This feature no longer works. Any attempt to open an image preview, instead opens a website that loads the image instead. Add to this, the reply is no longer work. Half the time I am told that I require a new version of the software to view a reply.
I also cannot interact with replies to any forwarded messages, as they will instead to take you out of your current chat or channel, to a completely different location.
This has broken the basic functionality of the software. If this is not reversed, I will be moving over to Discord.

And I have to get out of it many times to it works again ‚Ä¶. I hope you can help me. Thanks üòä üôèüèª

title: Great application
text:
Telegram messenger is the most used app in my country (iran)
Even the people who had no idea what is instant messaging are now struggling to find internet connection to be using telegram.
    The appearance is really nice and is highly flexible to your standards.
The speed is one of those things that is keeping me and others from using other applications.
I have never seen any problems regarding the privacy and for me it has been safe for around 3,4 years.
Best of all is the tendecy to grow;
Telegram is constantly being updated and lots of things have changed during the years.
      Only one problem i have come across is when i am playing music;
The app is always  automatically trying to download the previous song and if i ever forget to cancel the download, the damage is done and if this happens too often lots of data would be gone! Which is why i am getting this app 4stars but other than that, it is highly recommended by me.

title: Customizable Timelines!
text:
I love everything about Telegram and the amount of customizations that come with the features. The platform gives as much control to the users as best possible.

I believe that it is missing one key feature that would make a big difference.

Customizable timelines that you can add select channels and group chats into.

Working similarly as channels and group chats, one could create multiple timelines customized with certain group chats and channels as the user sees fit.

The posts within a customized timeline can work like forwarded messages where one could tap on the name of the originating name of the channel or group chat to expand them to see more details, join the group chat, channel or maybe reply in comments if the expanded originating channel has that option set up.

I believe this would make interacting on Telegram much more fun and interesting.

title: I like it
text: I use Telegram to keep in contact with lovely people I met through tumblr but who live overseas, so regular texting wouldn't work without racking up huge fees. Telegram makes conversations easy, and I love being able to see when my friends have been online last. And the ability to send gifs is wonderful! I do, however, have some suggestions: When a gif is received from someone else, it would be nice to be able to save that gif to my phone. Also, being able to customise notification sounds by importing them from my phone or Zedge or other ringtone apps like that.

title: Treatable Problems includes Apple Store Ban!
text:
Recent report that new iPhoneSE users unable to download Telegram app from Apple Store. I was unable to contact Telegram with this important intel. 
Easily correctable problems include 1. Date all posts 2. Allow Reply 3. Post NAME of Admin with group name, otherwise mysterious admins have no accountability for their sometimes ridiculous or slanderous statements. 4. Comment right below that post rather than all over the place! 
This confusion leads to people not knowing WHO or WHAT Reply poster is complaining about because Replies not connected even by date with original post.

title: 10X better than standard messages
text: This is like iMessage for everyone.  You can literally send entire movies up to 2 GB now.  Your messages are encrypted, unlike when you send a green bubble in the regular messenger app‚Ä¶those messages aren‚Äôt even encrypted and anyone can read them if they actually want to.  I can‚Äôt believe some people still prefer the standard messenger app‚Ä¶I guess if you don‚Äôt know it doesn‚Äôt matter‚Ä¶ but since I know I‚Äôm dumbfounded.  Do better America.  Upgrade your texting.

title: Telegram keeps saying wait 1 minute to log in
text:
I love the telegram app. I will give it 3 stars b/c the only issue I have ever had was today because I cannot log in. Today when I enter my password it tells me that it‚Äôs incorrect and that I need to wait 1 minute to log back in. I do not know what to do. I have not changed my password. I updated the app today. I have restarted my phone.  I have read online that someone possibly could have hacked the account and changed the password; therefore, I do not know what to do. Please advise. Thank you‚Äî-anything will be helpful Bc I had a lot of stuff saved and I need it back.  Thanks. 
JJ

title: Best Messaging App
text: I just downloaded this for the first time a few days ago, and I'm already addicted! I love the group chats, and the app is easy to use. One thing I do find frustrating is that if you click out of a group chat and then return, it jumps to the most recent message, which can be a problem in larger groups (I'm in one with 170+ members). It would be nice if it would save your last position in the chat and then give you the option to scroll to the most recent messages. Other than that, I have no complaints! It's 10 times better than Discord and Facebook.

title: Most stupid update of all time
text: The person in charge of this update should be fired because he took the most best social app and turned it to complete rubbish in the previous versions the most weakest connection would be enough to connect but now a strong connection and still wont connect and the ui has become very stupid looking and the calls have become so irritating  it keeps saying contacting half the time and the handsfree feature when calling doesn't work anymore Really mad for messing with my favorite app

title: Strong suggestion
text: Overall it‚Äôs really solid, however in the interest of people who use this app for private conversations I would recommend taking the ability to save messages or images off in a secret chat, it notifies you when someone screenshots but it‚Äôs pretty much pointless if someone can save an image. For example if someone is sending a picture containing sensitive information yes they get notified if the image is screenshoted but if the person wants to they can just save it and the sender doesn‚Äôt know. Really strong suggestion.

title: Degraded quality
text:
I like Telegram. I think it‚Äôs a very useful service.  Although the app is getting increasingly cluttered as well as cracks in features are showing.  Voice chat has quality issues, that really shouldn‚Äôt struggle as it will just drop out rather quickly.

But more importantly, and the reason why I decided to finally review it.  Is that ads appear in groups.  I can‚Äôt imagine what fool thought this was a good idea; it‚Äôs jarring, distracting, always unrelated content, always unwanted, I haven‚Äôt visited an ad in three years and I‚Äôm not starting now.  It detracts from the actual content and damages the experience.  How about make features people want to use, ads waste user time and make an app go from welcoming to hostile.

title: bug report
text:
The application certainly earns a five-star rating! However, I've consistently come across a persistent bug that needs addressing. 

The issue occurs when I'm in a Telegram call and an audible alarm goes off (or anything that produces sound on the phone goes off) . This triggers a glitch in the Telegram app where both the sound and the microphone disconnect. To regain access to both devices, I have to end and restart the call. The problem is easy to replicate. Please address this bug

title: Good....but needs improvements
text: I love the app. The features are great but the time delivery is not as fast as you said. I‚Äôm still comparing your platform to whatsapp because I‚Äôm about to make a switch. Whenever I send a message to my friends and family, it takes a few minutes for it to be delivered. They are living overseas but still whatsapp is faster. Please can you think about a new update that can fix this problem? It would be perfect! And, by the way, you can also add the fonction where people can post status üôèüèΩ. That would be fun!üòä. Thank you for your hard work ‚úåüèΩ

title: Clearing conversations on both sides
text: Telegram is a wonderful app, leagues ahead of major competitors, based on it customizablity and flexibility it is really good for the most part. However a major issue I have is how one member of a conversation can opt to clear the chat for both participants. If anything it should be one sided and not affect both parties. The ability to unilaterally delete a chat completely makes things very unfair and uncertain. I suggest that feature be patched out especially since a lot of business is conducted on the app. There‚Äôs the obvious consequence of fraud and scamming making it super easy to clear their tracks. I‚Äôd ask that the developers work and fix this issue.

title: Too many bugs for 5.1.1 version

title: Annoying app

So what's up? Why is it making that sound? So I constantly feel someone is sending me a message but it's not showing up :(

I have group message notifications off so this looks like a problem with personal messages. 
Or I don't know because I don't know what's going on and it's EXTREMELY FRUSTRATING üò°

title: Bug Fixes
text: Man I loved when telegram fixed it problems with 3D Touch buts like they fix a thing and another one gets crazy, when I try to delete a photo it lags and shuts the app. I thought it was just my phone but I‚Äôve tried it on other phones and it‚Äôs the same problem. title: Telegram calls constantly ‚Äúconnecting...‚Äù!
text: I love telegram and have been a loyal user since 2016. However, recently i have not been able to make any phone calls as it will always be connecting. The calls will never connect at all and hang up after 30 secs. i‚Äôve tried switching to mobile data, all the different wifis i have and it still wouldn‚Äôt work. It has been a super huge problem and i have been using other platforms to make my calls, which have all been working well. I love using Telegram and still use it today for messaging, but i am very disappointed by the call function recently. Please do solve this, it is an issue that my friends have been facing as well.

title: Thanks for the privacy you made for us
text:
The only thing that matters to everyone is privacy sometimes people try to use your messages or try to betraying you with their own messages or even forwarding your private messages but you work hard to stop these things . With the new update I can confidently send message without any worry about the consequences. 
The best messaging app I‚Äôve ever have in my life! 
But only one thing! Calling quality needs to be better than this without interrupting the call.

title: Telegram Support is Worthless
text:
Messages and photos I had with my boyfriend were deleted. I still have no idea why because my settings were set so nothing ever deleted automatically. 

I tried reaching out to Telegram support because I lost a lot of really precious memories and messages that I didn‚Äôt have saved anywhere else. Telegram support is a joke. It says it‚Äôs run by volunteers. I sent multiple messages asking, begging for help recovering my lost messages, but even after a week the messages I sent to report haven‚Äôt even been read. There is no number to call. All I could do is wait. Because of this I won‚Äôt be using telegram. Terrible customer support is a big sign that Telegram does not value its patrons.

title: Not sure
text: Overall my experience with telegram is not been a good one there a lot of people on there pretending to be who they‚Äôre not in you start talking to them and they start asking for personal information or wanting You to open a Instagram for them somer even ask for money Oh and some even start a conversation off By sending you nude  photos I came to this website trying to find something real after 12 years of marriage and being separated I don‚Äôt think that‚Äôs too much to ask for but my overall experience with Telegram has not been a good one and as of now I don‚Äôt recommend downloading this app and I Wouldn‚Äôt read it with a star but I have to put at least one that is all

title: Audio problems galore
text:
Half the time I can‚Äôt hear who I‚Äôm video chatting with (and it‚Äôs not user error - I know how to adjust volume and mute/un-mute). I can resolve the problem usually by hanging up then calling back.
Other times when I receive a video chat, if the video is on, there‚Äôs no option to turn on speaker - so during the call, I have to decide whether to hold the phone up to my ear to hear them (and they get to look at the inside of my ear) or I get to see them and try to read their lips‚Ä¶
The only reason I keep this app is because I have contacts who refuse to use any other‚Ä¶ (but I don‚Äôt know why they chose to be loyal to this lower tier communication app.)

title: Hi
text: ‚ÄèHello, I have been used the Telegram application for a long time and I would like to find all the features inside it because it is a special application for me, but from my point of view, the application needs only one feature, which is the story feature that is inside all applications. title: Bug - after enabling topics, can't view own content anymore
text: Bug - after enabling topics in a group, my images that were already posted before the topics were enabled, which now shown in the then newly created #General chat, are not accessible when tapped (black image). But when I disable topics off again, I can view all of my content again through the 'single' chat. Why is that, is that a bug or by design, because I can still see these previous-to-topic posted images in 'View as Messages' but not in 'View as Topics'....Latest iOS and latest app version.

title: Great app, terrible stickers
text:
The telegram app is great for everything, except the stickers feature; which is intuitive up until the point the tell you that your sticker must be a 512x512 png FILE (not photo), and it gives you extra hoops to jump though.

My other grievance with the stickerbot of telegram is that it does not allow you to import your stickers from WhatsApp, which is where the majority of the stickers I use are. If the team can fix these issues, the app would be so much better, and dare I say it, convince even more people to ditch WhatsApp and switch to telegram.

title: Kinda Disappointed Lately
text:
I love this app, it‚Äôs my favoriting messaging app, though I‚Äôve been a little disappointed in its behaviour recently.

It likes to reset itself and rid itself of all of my theme and language settings, so now my whole theme is gone for the third time and I can‚Äôt even set it back because the option to change the entire inner app‚Äôs colour is gone. (Which is really sad, that was one of my favourite features.) and my custom language has to be re-installed yet again.

Really inconvenient and disappointing that my app keeps changing without my say-so‚Ä¶

title: Calling Issues
text: I‚Äôve had nothing but issues since installing the app. Majority of the time I‚Äôm not able to get through to my contacts overseas. It‚Äôs always saying contacting/waiting and will be contacting for a very long time if I decide to be patient and wait. If it says ringing then I know it‚Äôs ringing through on their end. Four days now and I haven‚Äôt been able to make contact. I don‚Äôt see any other reviews mentioning this issue. I was really hoping to replace WhatsApp with Telegram as WhatsApp apparently is not being updated or will be working on most older phones anymore. Could someone please tell me why ami having these issues. Tried to even turn off my device and nothing changed.

title: Scammers use this app
text:
I have been applying for jobs on Indeed and a scammer reached out to me asking me to download this app for the job briefing and interview. After doing so, red flags began to pop up; you know, the obvious red flags.. misspelled words, grammatical errors, not answering my questions. I think the end goal was for me to be ‚Äúhired‚Äù and they have me fill out a W2 and bank deposit form for access to my SSN and bank details. 

I‚Äôm not saying this is the apps fault, I am saying it‚Äôs not as secure as they may think. Just be aware and on your toes if someone you don‚Äôt know asks you to download this app as it seems scammers are now using it.

title: With honor
text:
The problem I faced is that sometimes videos fail to open or pause properly within the iOS app. This inconsistency in video playback has been frustrating and has affected my overall experience with the platform.

As an avid user of iOS, I rely on the device for various tasks, including video viewing. When the videos fail to open or pause as expected, it disrupts the flow and immersion, which can be quite bothersome, especially when trying to enjoy media content.

title: Nearly perfection
text: This app is sheer good. Security, speed and flexibility is top notch. Only issue I have with this app is during messaging someone when I drag down to normal state it doesn‚Äôt come normally, that‚Äôs the only issue I have seen. Also Your policy of if away for 12 months/ 6 months is a little bit problematic. Like if someone is busy might not come at all or might use other services. Instead give a feature like: If someone attends one will get an option for authentication that proves he/she is actually back instead of deleting account in first place.

title: Fix the hide number options is no longer working
text: Yes Telegram has been a very wonderful app that can‚Äôt be compared to any other in today‚Äôs modern technology but why is Telegram option for hiding numbers from being seen not active? If these options no longer working why is Telegram still making us believe it works whereas is not? Kindly fix it. I try to keep my number private but it was still seen by unwanted contacts. I felt bad!

title: Got scammed
text:
I was reached via text message and was told to download this app‚Ä¶ once downloaded I was conducted in a fake interview and was sent a bad check that was suppose to be for ‚Äúequipment material‚Äù. After trying to cash the check ‚Ä¶ thinking I had a ‚Äújob‚Äù.. the check turned out to be fake. I felt so stupid being the scammer had me sign over most of my personal information! 

Please be on the lookout because scammers are using this app!!! They will text your phone acting like they found your resume and will tell you your interview will be held through chat on this app. 

I tried reporting the chat but that didn‚Äôt really help.. they only gave me the option to block the individual. Thankfully I screenshotted everything before the scammer was able to block me after I notified him the check was fake. I put my trust into this man because everything seemed so real! Once I called him through this app his English was very broken and he sounded like he was Indian or Nigerian or something.

Please be on the lookout and only chat with people you know.

title: Pins - Need ability for more

The second, please find a work around to get the app directly from your website for IOS users. 

Thank you for this app!!

title: Customer Service is a SPAM BOT
text: Beware.  If a chat that you participate in decides to use the spam filtering bot and you accidentally find your self blocked because it thinks you are spam then you are out of luck.  You get banned from typing in the chat or in some cases from the entire chat for 3 days or however long it feels like you are kicked out.  The bot will only let you submit a claim once. At that you are out of luck.  No human to talk to fix it. The app is decent on everything else.  But they need to fix their customer service.  I don‚Äôt like being at the mercy of a bot.
